name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Timothy Paul FLANDERS, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Timothy Paul FLANDERS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Superior Court dated September 18, 1998 is vacated and the matter is remanded to the Superior Court for disposition of any remaining issues.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph P. Burt, Erie, for Timothy Flanders.
Joseph P. Conti, Erie, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
734 A.2d 1280
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Timothy Paul FLANDERS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Aug. 9, 1999.
Decided Sept. 8, 1999.
Joseph P. Burt, Erie, for Timothy Flanders.
Joseph P. Conti, Erie, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
